name: The Marge-ian Chronicles
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Brian Kelley
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Lisa signs up for an opportunity to be part of a mission to colonize Mars in ten years, and Homer's strategy to use reverse psychology to talk her out of it backfires.
